content: Eric Wieser suggested writing an ad-hoc typeclass for the lemmas in this PR, so that I could unify the additive and multiplicative versions. I don't really care whether we use a typeclass or prime the lemmas, but I would quite like to see this PR going through after 2 months of waiting :smile:
To be clear: I'm reasonably happy the current state of the PR, but don't really feel qualified to review it
